message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $12,000.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm happy to work with you.  However, $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,000? I believe this is still a fair price for both of us.
